banner: New here? Learn more about Spotlight PA's nonpartisan, nonprofit reporting »
featured-promo-image-description: Support Spotlight PA's nonpartisan journalism and your gift will be DOUBLED as part of our Sunshine Week challenge.
sticky-image-description: Get the top news from across Pennsylvania, plus some fun and a puzzle, all in one free daily email newsletter.
support-hed: Before you go, I have a request...
support-text: We grant elected officials extraordinary power when we give them our vote, which means we must demand extraordinary accountability once they are in office. That's why Spotlight PA's unbiased reporting is more important than ever. And for a very limited time, your support can go 2X as far. We're independent, with no corporate owner or profit motives. We’re unbiased, with no political agenda or opinion pieces. And we're a nonprofit, allowing us to prioritize investigative and public-service journalism that gets results. If you're looking for a meaningful way to make a difference in these uncertain times, I can't think of a better investment than Spotlight PA's truthful, accurate, trusted reporting for Pennsylvania — journalism that gets real results. For a limited time, during our Week of Giving, your tax-deductible support of any amount will be matched 2X — that's DOUBLED. Your donation now is urgently needed. — Christopher Baxter, CEO/President PS: If you prefer to mail a check, you can send it to: Spotlight PA, PO Box 11728, Harrisburg, PA 17108-1728
takeover-dek: We only have 6 days left to raise $12,000 to ensure our unmatched nonpartisan, nonprofit reporting can continue. Give to Spotlight PA today & get it DOUBLED »
